'''Elder Teyya''' was an [[The Eremites|Eremite]] and a member of the [[Tanit]] tribe. 

==Profile==
Teyya was the head of the hunting party. According to [[Jeht]], she was "a more capable competitor" than [[Babel]], which made her a threat to Babel's rule of the tribe. Babel ordered Jeht to assassinate her, and Jeht "made her disappear in the desert."<ref>{{Ref/Quest|For Her Judgment Reaches to the Skies...}}</ref> Teyya's name appears struck out on the [[Crumpled Namelist]] in Jeht's tent in the [[Tanit Camps]].
